summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period from October 1, 2016, to October 31, 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned, indicating a significant balance in the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $1,487,060.93 on October 1, 2016.
An interest payment of $252.60 was credited to the account on October 31, 2016.
The ending balance as of October 31, 2016, was $1,487,313.53.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
